about_the_game:
Killer Dolls Dark Abyss tells the story of The Dolls, a group of female warriors in a quest to free their land from The Dark Queen Ixquel. Grab your weapon and crush your enemies in this challenging hack 'n' slash - bullet hell game.

Features:
  • Quick-paced combat: Combat in KDDA is fast and frenetic, as you face numerous enemies and fierce bosses. Additionally, you need to watch out for environmental traps that will make combat even more difficult.
  • Play as different Dolls: Unlock different girls in the game, each with a different weapon that grants her a unique combat style, adding variety to the gameplay experience.
  • Level-up your skills: Find health and magic upgrades to level up your Doll, and collect special gems to unlock stylish attacks to crush your adversaries.
  • Unlock additional outfits: Explore the world to find various stylish outfits for your Dolls, that you can either wear in game and the model’s gallery.
  • Uncover an engaging story: As you play, you will find out more about the world and The Dark Queen Ixquel's sinister plan.

  • Level-up your skills: Find health and magic upgrades to level up your Doll, and collect special gems to unlock stylish attacks to crush your adversaries.

name: Killer Dolls Dark Abyss

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10
  • Processor: 2GHz CPU
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 900 series +
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Killer Dolls Dark Abyss is a challenging and frenetic hack ‘n' slash - bullet-hell game where you play as a group of sexy and stylish girls, each one with a different magical weapon and combat style.
